00002 using System.Collections.Generic;
00003 using System.Linq;
00004 using System.Text;
00005 using ApplicationLogic.Model;
00006 using NUnit.Framework;
00007 
00008 namespace NUnit_Tests.ApplicationLogic
00009 {
00010     [TestFixture]
00011     class BankAccountTest
00012     {
00013         private BankAccount ba;
00014 
00015         [SetUp]
00016         public void SetUp()
00017         {
00018             ba = new BankAccount(123, "Test", 0.0);
00019         }
00020 
00021         [Test]
00022         [ExpectedException(typeof(ArgumentException))]
00023         public void TestBalanceUnder0()
00024         {
00025             ba = new BankAccount(123, "Test", -1.0);
00026         }
00027 
00028         [Test]
00029         [ExpectedException(typeof(ArgumentException))]
00030         public void TestWithdrawalWithTooHighValues()
00031         {
00032             double amountToWithdrawTooHigh = 50.0;
00033             ba.Withdraw(amountToWithdrawTooHigh);
00034             TestWithdrawalWithTooSmallValues();
00035         }
00036 
00037         [Test]
00038         [ExpectedException(typeof(ArgumentException))]
00039         public void TestWithdrawalWithTooSmallValues()
00040         {
00041             double amountToWithdrawTooSmall = -10.0;
00042             ba.Withdraw(amountToWithdrawTooSmall);
00043         }
00044 
00045         [Test]
00046         [ExpectedException(typeof(ArgumentException))]
00047         public void TestDepositWithTooSmallValue()
00048         {
00049             double amountToDepositTooSmall = -10;
00050             ba.Deposit(amountToDepositTooSmall);
00051         }
00052 
00053         [Test]
00054         [ExpectedException(typeof(ArgumentException))]
00055         public void TestTransferWithTooSmallValue()
00056         {
00057             double amountToTransferTooSmall = -10;
00058             ba.Transfer(123, amountToTransferTooSmall);
00059         }
00060 
00061         [Test]
00062         public void TestOrdinaryFunctions()
00063         {
00064             double currentValue = ba.Balance;
00065             double deposit = 50.0;
00066             currentValue += deposit;
00067             ba.Deposit(deposit);
00068             Assert.AreEqual(currentValue, ba.Balance);
00069 
00070             double withdraw = 25.0;
00071             currentValue -= withdraw;
00072             ba.Withdraw(withdraw);
00073             Assert.AreEqual(currentValue, ba.Balance);
00074 
00075             double transfer = 10.50;
00076             currentValue -= transfer;
00077             ba.Transfer(123, transfer);
00078             Assert.AreEqual(currentValue, ba.Balance);
00079         }
00080     }
00081 }
